column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Not a whole lot to add to this yelp page considering the number of reviews and the high rating. All of the bakery goods are pretty amazing
column2: but my favorite by far is the kougin aman. It's flaky like a croissant with a caramelized glaze on it too. I haven't actually ran into a line here
column3: but I hear it can be pretty long sometimes. Studying/working here isn't the best idea
column4: but hanging out with people here is nice! Parking is also pretty spacious
column5: but if the lot is full you can probably find street parking nearby.
